description: Glamour and fashion are the hallmarks of this restaurant in Phi Beach, one of the most attractive nightclub-cum-lounge bars on the Costa Smeralda. Take a seat on the terrace right by the water and soak up the romantic sunsets and sea views as you enjoy Italian and Mediterranean dishes created by a famous chef from Lombardy who adds just the right touch of contemporary flavour. Also open for lunch, with some of the evening menu dishes available alongside an array of simpler options.
